   if (window.location.hash &amp;&amp; window.location.hash == '#_=_') {
        window.location.hash = '';
    }
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   (function (i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
        i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r; i[r] = i[r] || function () {
            (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
        }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date(); a = s.createElement(o),
        m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0]; a.async = 1; a.src = g; m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
    })(window, document, 'script', '//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');

    ga('create', 'UA-37066016-1', 'muhlenberg.edu');
    var pageTitle = "Wood Dining Commons";
    if (pageTitle == 'Error Page') {
        /* Track generic Errors */
        var url = "/error/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else if (pageTitle == '404 Error Page') {
        /* Track 404 Errors */
        var url = "/404/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else if (pageTitle == '500 Error Page') {
        /* Track 500 Errors */
        var url = "/500/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else {
        ga('send', 'pageview');
    }
    /**
    * Function that tracks a click on an outbound link in Google Analytics.
    * This function takes a valid URL string as an argument, and uses that URL string
    * as the event label. Setting the transport method to 'beacon' lets the hit be sent
    * using 'navigator.sendBeacon' in browser that support it.
    */
    var trackOutboundLink = function (url) {
        ga('send', 'event', 'outbound', 'click', url, {
            'transport': 'beacon'
        });
    }
    $(function () {
        $('a[href*="http://"], a[href*="https://"]').each(function (index) {
            var currentOnClick = $(this).attr("onclick");
            if (currentOnClick === undefined || currentOnClick === null || currentOnClick === "") {
                var href = $(this).attr("href");
                $(this).attr("onclick", "trackOutboundLink('" + href + "');");
            }
        });
    });
  </script>

 <body>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   $(document).ready(function () {
            $("#tabs").tabs();
            $("#register").click(function () {
                $("#login-fields").hide();
                $("#create-new").show();
                //            alert("Clicked register");
            });
            $("#already-registered").click(function () {
                $("#create-new").hide();
                $("#login-fields").show();
                //            alert("Clicked Already Registered");
            });
            $("#SignIn").click(
                function () {
                });
            //variable to reference window
            $myWindow = $('#openid-box');
            //instantiate the dialog
            $myWindow.dialog({
                height: 550,
                width: 700,
                modal: true,
                position: 'center',
                autoOpen: false,
                title: 'Join us - It\'s Free!!!',
                beforeclose: function (event) { return $("dlgclose"); }
            });
            $("#dayFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = '';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = 'none';
                //alert("eventToday");
            });
            $("#weekFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = '';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = 'none';
                //alert("eventWeek");
            });
            $("#monthFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = '';
            });   
            var last = $("#nav #nav-stripe ul.pureCssMenu.pureCssMenum li.pureCssMenui0:last");
            last.hover(
		  function () {
		      var viewArea = $(window).width();
		      var offset = last.offset();
		      var outer = offset.left + 155;
		      var diff = "-88px"; //(viewArea - outer) + 'px';
		      if (viewArea &lt; outer) {
		          $(this).find("ul").css("left", diff);
		      }
		  },
		  function () {
		      $(this).find("ul").css("left", "0px");
		  }
	);
            //do not remove this line, it is used for later processing... 
        });
        //do not remove this line, it is used for later processing...
  </script>

   <div id="header-txt">
    By protecting and improving our environment, the communities where we do business and the students we serve, Muhlenberg Dining makes every day a better day and every tomorrow a better tomorrow.
   </div>

     $(document).ready(function () {
            $('#iview').show();

                pauseTime: 6000,
                directionNav: false,
                fx: "fade",
                    tooltipY: -15,
                    timer: "Bar",
                    pauseOnHover: "false",
                    controlNav: "true"

    <div class="main-corners">
     <div class="column-66 float-left">
      <div class="pane-accord" id="tcm3543">
       <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
                $("#accordion_3543").accordion({
                    heightStyle: "content"
                });
            });
       </script>
       <style type="text/css">
        #accordion_3543 h3 {
	        font:bold 12px Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif !important;
        }
                #accordion_3543 div.accordionBody {
	        border-top:1px dashed #ccc;
	        background:#f4f5f6;
                        overflow: hidden;
        }
        #accordion_3543 div.ui-corner-bottom {
            border-bottom-left-radius:0;
            border-bottom-right-radius:0;
        }
       </style>
       <div id="hideinse" style="display: block">
        <h2 class="locs">
         Wood Dining Commons
        </h2>
        <div>
         <p>
          <img title="WDC_NEW_M" alt="WDC_NEW_M" style="float: right; width: 210px; height: 197px;" src="/Images/WDC_LOGO_2016_DRAFT2_tcm1703-113419.jpg" />
          Finding your favorite foods on campus is easy. We are proud to offer a dining program complete with signature brands and menu selections that include just about every item you can imagine. Just feast your eyes on what we have available!
         </p>
         <p>
          <a target="_blank" title="WDC_Navigating_Brochure_16" href="/Images/navigating_WDC_trifold_2016_tcm1703-113425.pdf">
           Wood Dining Commons Brochure
          </a>
          |
          <a target="_blank" title="Kosher-Dining-Brochure.pdf" href="/Images/Kosher-Dining-Brochure_tcm1703-51561.pdf">
           Kosher Dining Brochure
          </a>
         </p>
         <p>
          With eight individual dining platforms, the Wood Dining Commons offers casual and fine dining in a spectacular new setting. The Wood Dining Commons is known for its chef attended stations, customizable meals, and accommodation of dietary needs. The dining venues include: 
         </p>
         <ul>
          <li>
           <strong>
            <img title="Noshery_Logo" alt="Noshery_Logo" style="width: 125px; height: 20px;" src="/Images/NOSHERY_STARK_tcm1703-110954.jpg" />
           </strong>
            - Kosher kitchens under rabbinical supervision with separate meat and dairy areas. 
           <strong>
            The Noshery opens at 11:00 a.m. during the week. It closes at 2:00 p.m. on Friday in observance of the Sabbath. It re-opens on Saturday at 11:00 a.m. for Brunch.
           </strong>
          </li>
          <li>
           <strong>
            <img title="WFG_Logo" alt="WFG_Logo" style="width: 125px; height: 20px;" src="/Images/WILDFIRE_GRILLE_tcm1703-110961.jpg" />
           </strong>
            - made to order breakfast sandwiches, burgers, veggie burgers, grilled vegetables, french fries and our signature Buffalo Chicken Meltdown. 
          </li>
          <li>
           <strong>
            <img title="CSD_Logo" alt="CSD_Logo" style="width: 125px; height: 20px;" src="/Images/CHEW%20ST%20DELI_tcm1703-110958.jpg" />
           </strong>
            - made to order sandwiches and wraps as well as two fresh, homemade soup du jours. 
          </li>
          <li>
           <strong>
            <img title="CTC_Logo" alt="CTC_Logo" style="width: 125px; height: 20px;" src="/Images/Chefs%20Table_tcm1703-110960.jpg" />
           </strong>
            - classic favorites as well as our chefs' specialties. 
          </li>
          <li>
           <strong>
            <img title="Croutons_Logo" alt="Croutons_Logo" style="width: 125px; height: 20px;" src="/Images/CROUTONS_tcm1703-110955.jpg" />
           </strong>
            - a fully loaded salad bar as well as a salad toss station. 
          </li>
          <li>
           <strong>
            <img title="Magellans_Logo" alt="Magellans_Logo" style="width: 125px; height: 20px;" src="/Images/MAGELLAN'S_tcm1703-110959.jpg" />
           </strong>
            - a world of flavor with international comfort foods. 
          </li>
          <li>
           <strong>
            <img title="MM_Logo" alt="MM_Logo" style="width: 125px; height: 20px;" src="/Images/MANGIA%20MANGIA_tcm1703-110956.jpg" />
           </strong>
            - Italian cuisine, including brick oven-style pizza and made to order pasta dishes.
          </li>
          <li style="list-style: none">
           <br />
           <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/6swZNfW6Ias" frameborder="0">
             
           </iframe>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
        <div id="accordion_3543">
         <h3>
          <a href="#">
           On the Menu: Wood Dining Commons
          </a>
         </h3>
         <div class="accordionBody">
          <ul>
           <li>
            <a class="" href="/Images/WeeklyMenu_tcm1703-129704.htm" target="_blank">
             11/28/2016 - 12/4/2016
            </a>
           </li>
          </ul>
         </div>
         <h3>
          <a href="#">
           Hours of Operation
          </a>
         </h3>
         <div class="accordionBody">
          <p>
           Week of: 11/28/2016 - 12/04/2016
          </p>
          <p>
           Monday - Thursday: 7:00 a.m. - 8:00 p.m.
           <br />
           Friday: 7:00 a.m. - 7:00 p.m.
           <br />
           Saturday: 10:00 a.m. - 7:00 p.m.
           <br />
           Sunday: 10:00 a.m. - 8:00 p.m.
           <br />
          </p>
         </div>
         <h3>
          <a href="#">
           On the Menu: Noshery
          </a>
         </h3>
         <div class="accordionBody">
          <span>
           <div>
            <br />
           </div>
           <div>
            To view the Noshery's weekly menu, please click on the link below.
           </div>
           <div>
            <br />
           </div>
           <div>
            <a href="http://lvkosher.org/" title="Lehigh Valley Kashrut Commission">
             http://lvkosher.org/
            </a>
           </div>
           <div>
            <br />
           </div>
          </span>
         </div>
         <h3>
          <a href="#">
           Door Rates
          </a>
         </h3>
         <div class="accordionBody">
          <span>
          </span>
          <p>
           <strong>
            For Customers paying cash, credit or debit: 
           </strong>
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            Breakfast (7:00 a.m. - 11:00 a.m.): $8.00
           </li>
           <li>
            Lunch (11:00 a.m. - 4:30 p.m.): $11.50
           </li>
           <li>
            Dinner (4:30 p.m. - Close): $17.75
           </li>
           <li>
            Brunch (Sat &amp; Sun 10:00 a.m. - 4:00 p.m.) $14.50 
           </li>
          </ul>
          <p>
           <strong>
            For Students on a Meal Plan Paying with 'Berg Bucks:
           </strong>
            
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            Breakfast: $5.62
           </li>
           <li>
            Lunch: $7.82
           </li>
           <li>
            Dinner: $13.50 
           </li>
           <li>
            Brunch: $7.82
           </li>
          </ul>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div>
         <strong>
          Note: During the academic year, the Noshery opens at 11:00 a.m. during the week. It closes at 2:00 p.m. on Friday in observance of the Sabbath. 
         </strong>
         <strong>
          It reopens on Saturday at 11:00 a.m. for Brunch.
         </strong>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="column-33 float-right">
      <div id="loggedin">
       <span id="span_loggedin">
       </span>
      </div>
      <div class="sub-news-top">
       <div class="sub-news-rt">
       </div>
      </div>
      <div id="sub-news">
       <span class="RHS_Title">
        In This Section
       </span>
       <ul>

         </a>
